abstract: On a day when the Mets officially announced that they would make significant changes to the dimensions at Citi Field, Sandy Alderson, the team's general manager, offered some measured insight into what the team that will play there next year may look like.
snippet: On a day when the Mets officially announced that they would make significant changes to the dimensions at Citi Field, Sandy Alderson, the team's general manager, offered some measured insight into what the team that will play there next year may look...

headline.main: Mets' Roster May Get Makeover, Too
